titleInfo.title: Data Publication: Tactile, Force and Torque Data of Robotic Lid Closing

mods.abstract: This archive contains 51 sequences of a shadow motor hand with tactile fingertips that executes a "closing lid" motion on top of a tactile sensor board, stored as rosbag files.
